Package uno.anahata.asi.model.core

Class AbstractModelMessage<R extends Response,T extends AbstractToolMessage>

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.AbstractMessage
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.AbstractModelMessage<R,T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeminiModelMessage
public abstract class AbstractModelMessage<R extends Response,T extends AbstractToolMessage> extends AbstractMessage
Represents a message originating from the AI model. It extends AbstractMessage, sets its role to MODEL, and provides convenience methods for accessing tool calls.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

    • setRawJson

      public void setRawJson(String rawJson)
      Sets the raw JSON representation of the model's response and fires a property change event. This method replaces any existing content.
      Parameters:
      rawJson - The raw JSON string.

    • appendRawJson

      public void appendRawJson(String chunk)
      Appends a raw JSON chunk to the existing content. If multiple chunks are appended, they are automatically wrapped in a JSON array to maintain validity for pretty-printing.
      Parameters:
      chunk - The JSON chunk to append.

    • setTokenCount

    • isGarbageCollectable

      public boolean isGarbageCollectable()
      Determines if this message is eligible for "hard pruning" (permanent removal from history). A message is generally considered garbage if it has no parts and is not explicitly pinned. A model message is not garbage collectable if it is currently streaming.
      Overrides:
      isGarbageCollectable in class AbstractMessage
      Returns:
      true if the message can be safely removed from history.

    • getToolCalls

      public List<AbstractToolCall> getToolCalls()
      Filters and returns only the tool call parts from this message.
      Returns:
      A list of AbstractToolCall parts, or an empty list if none exist.

    • processPendingTools

      public void processPendingTools()
      Processes all tool responses associated with this message that are in a PENDING state. Tools with APPROVE_ALWAYS permission are executed, while others are rolled to NOT_EXECUTED.

    • createToolMessage

      protected abstract T createToolMessage()
